about.pageDescription: Learn about our mission to make AI accessible to everyone.

hero.title: About AIverse
hero.subtitle: Making AI accessible and understandable for everyone

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: We believe in the transformative power of AI technology. Our mission is to help individuals and businesses discover, evaluate, and implement AI tools that can enhance their productivity and creativity.
mission.description2: By providing comprehensive information, unbiased reviews, and detailed comparisons, we empower our users to make informed decisions about AI tools that best fit their needs.

contact.pageDescription: Get in touch with the AIverse team. We're here to help with any questions or feedback.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.

q1.question: How can I submit my AI tool?
q1.answer: You can submit your AI tool through our submission form. Click on 'Submit Tool' in the navigation menu and fill out the required information.

q2.question: Is it free to list my tool?
q2.answer: Yes, basic listing is free. We also offer premium placement options for increased visibility.

q3.question: How are tools reviewed and rated?
q3.answer: Tools are rated by our community of users based on their experience. We also have an editorial team that reviews tools for accuracy and quality.

q4.question: Can I update my tool's information?
q4.answer: Yes, tool owners can request updates by contacting us through this form with their tool name and requested changes.
